transcripts.text: This is a collective crisis that requires collective action.
Let our country awake.  We have to worry about is there going to be enough food that we need to be able to survive as humans here on this planet.

Reject these pipelines and put an end to climate change now.  We can build the world we want and we can demand this one changes at the same time.  Climate justice now!  Climate justice now!  And this movement is spreading so fast.  And it's why I stand here wearing an adult diaper ready for jail.  Where I'm told the bathroom situation is dicey.  Today is the last Fire Grill Friday in DC, but it's not the last Fire Grill Friday.  In fact, we are just getting started.
